title: Costco Wholesale Corporation
description: Costco Wholesale Corporation utilizes a bold and memorable color palette comprising the hues C8102E (a vibrant red) and 0032A0 (a deep blue). These colors are prominently featured in the brand's promotional materials and website, as detailed in their official style guide sourced from https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60896d8a4dd57ebc29df4313/610b4088ce12c73968c57aec_Costco%20Redesign%20-%20Style%20Guide.pdf.
